data.text:
@CartlandDavid You can’t compare the worst months with a 52 year as you have about half a year with months that has lower death rates. 

I’m sure you are aware that the death rate so far this year is below the 5 year average.

@CartlandDavid What is this implying?

And if excess deaths are related to VI then what stops a smarty-pants saying “covid can give you a heart attack a year later”?
@CartlandDavid That's not going to be on the BBC news is it 🤔
@CartlandDavid Keep sharing we must keep a light on the truth .
